file_content.text: We have to check the comm device in the next room and find out who's behind this.
Jedi! Oh thank goodness. I thought they were going to kill me.
House Teral sent you, didn't they?
They called about an alliance--I was riding to meet them and--well, thank goodness you're here.
Do you know what reason Rist had for kidnapping you?
Why did Rist kidnap you?
No, no idea. Maybe something to do with the alliance?
I'm glad I was able to make it in time.
Happy to help.
Thank you--ouch--I'm still a little sore, but I'll live thanks to you.
Let's go.
Shouldn't we stay and try to find out who's behind this?
I was going to meet with House Teral to discuss the marriage-alliance when these assassins swooped in and knocked me off my thranta.
I woke up here. But were they trying to prevent the alliance? Who would want to do that?
Without the marriage-alliance, I can't get to the summit. Maybe someone doesn't want me to go.
They might want to stop me.
Who would care if you went to the summit? Though now that you mention it....
Neither the marriage nor the alliance matter to me--just getting to the summit.
I only care about the summit.
The summit? But maybe that's it--because now that you mention it....
Ulgo has the most to lose if House Teral becomes powerful again.
House Ulgo.
Well, yes, but that's what's strange. They never mentioned Ulgo.
As I lost consciousness, they were talking about Master Sidonie.
But how could she be involved? It has to be a frame job. It must be.
I believe Master Sidonie is very ill, but if I can get to the summit, I hope to help her.
I fear it's not.
I just want to trust Master Sidonie--argh! I'm sorry, my head, I still get these pains from the fall.
Maybe.
I'm sure she's innocent. Master Sidonie's working for peace--argh! I'm sorry, my head, I still get these pains from the fall.
Stop making excuses for Master Sidonie.
Don't delude yourself.
I'm not making excuses--argh! I'm sorry, my head, I still get these pains from the fall.
I can't leave here until I know if Master Sidonie was involved.
The kidnappers used to go into the other room to contact their employer. I'm sure we'll find a comm device there--we just need to see who they've been calling.
I'm sorry. I can't talk right now.
Just get me out of this place, Jedi.
